bug.author: janvainer
bug.description:
wandb --version && python --version && uname
Weights and Biases version: 0.9.4 Python version: 3.6.9 Operating System: Ubuntu
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
I am trying to log a histogram into wandb. The run appears on wandb, but the histogram is not there. Other stuff such as scalars or Images is logged properly. What is wrong? <denchmark-h:h3>What I Did</denchmark-h>
` import wandb import numpy as np wandb.init(entity="MyEntity", project="my project", name="testing") a = np.random.randn(100) hist = np.histogram(a) h = wandb.Histogram(np_histogram=hist) wandb.log({"gradients": wandb.Histogram(np_histogram=hist)}) `

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.86. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/wandb/client>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.
Hey @LordOfLuck , thanks for reporting. Looking into this.
@LordOfLuck works on Mac, will test on Ubuntu now. Meanwhile could you please update wandb, and see if that fixes the issue?

It worked on my Ubuntu machine as well. Please let me know if updating wandb fixes the issue for you. Otherwise could you please make another run, with code saving turned on, and share the run link with us? If it is private, you can send it to my mail at <denchmark-link:mailto:artyom@wandb.com>artyom@wandb.com</denchmark-link>
Thanks for quick response, i will try to update later today - I am travelling now.
Hi, updating to version 0.9.5 solved the issue. Thanks :)
